title: WATCH | Amy’Leigh kidnapping: bail proceedings resume
text:
WATCH | Amy’Leigh kidnapping: bail proceedings resume

20 September, 09:09 AM

Suspended Laerskool Kollegepark Grade RR teacher Tharina Human and her co-accused, Pieter Jacobus van Zyl and Laetitia Nel, are expected to appear in the Vanderbijlpark Magistrate's Court for a second day on Friday to apply for their release on bail.



The three are accused of kidnapping 6-year-old Amy'Leigh de Jager outside Laerskool Kollegepark on September 2.

Four men snatched her from her mother's car at the Laerskool Kollegepark at around 07:40 and drove off in a white Toyota Fortuner, News24 previously reported.

Human was a close friend of the De Jager family.
description: Suspended Laerskool Kollegepark Grade RR teacher Tharina Human and her co-accused, Pieter Jacobus van Zyl and Laetitia Nel, are expected to appear in the Vanderbijlpark Magistrate's Court for a second day on Friday to apply for their release on bail. Watch.
